General.Name: Unibel S.A
General.Description: Unibel S.A. produces and sells cheese products in France. It offers its products primarily under the La Vache qui rit, Kiri, Mini Babybel, Leerdammer, Boursin, Pom'Potes, laughs, and GoGo squeeZ, as well as approximately thirty of local brands. The company was incorporated in 1921 and is headquartered in Paris, France.
